id.description: id of the backend data this component is for

input_data_type.description: Optional type of the input data. Can be used for frontend customization of the component for concrete data type, eg. by using it in CSS class names.

image.description:
Image URL. It's optional field. If it's not set then image component has been choosen, but no image like path field found.
Image field value either ends by any of these extension: ('.apng', '.png', '.avif', '.gif', '.jpg', '.jpeg', '.jtif', '.pjpeg', '.pjp', '.svg', '.webp', '.bmp', '.tif', '.tiff'),
or the field name ends by either 'url' or 'link' (case insensitive)
